page.title: 05BADBURY RINGS-HISTORY WALKS.
page.content: {(HISTORICAL AND NATURE WALKS) { At {BADBURY RINGS}the NATIONAL {TRUST}have made a lot of trails for the public.Each trail has beautiful surroundings and is very{historical. For instance on some trails there are lots of {pebbles}which the {ROMANS}used for ammunition.There is also {pottery}from bowls and old mugs. {-PLEASURE {BADBURY RINGS }is always open to anyone who goes.It is a peaceful and an enjoyable place for all kinds of people.It costs nothing to get in. {BADBURY RINGS }is the best place to go on a hot and boring day. There is also a place for games like{FOOTBALL}, {Cricket}and {PARTY GAMES . Some people sit on deck chairs looking
